sen.j: 春日皇子（かすが の みこ、欽明天皇21年（560年）前後？ - 推古天皇23年（615年）？）は敏達天皇と妃・春日老女子の第二皇子。
sen.e: Prince Kasuga (around 560 - 615) was the second son of Emperor Bidatsu and his wife, OMINAGO no Otoji.
Prince Kasuga (around 560 - 615) was the second son of Emperor Bidatsu and his wife, OMINAGO no Otoji.
Prince Kasuga (around 560 - 615) was the second son of Emperor Bidatsu and his wife, OMINAGO no Otoji.

sen.j: 皇籍から春日小野氏へ養子となり、春日仲若子となる。
sen.e: He was adopted into KASUGA no Onouji (春日小野氏) from Imperial family and his name was changed to KASUGA no Nakatsukimi.
He was adopted into KASUGA no Onouji (春日小野氏) from Imperial family and his name was changed to KASUGA no Nakatsukimi.
He was adopted into KASUGA no Onouji (春日小野氏) from Imperial family and his name was changed to KASUGA no Nakatsukimi.

sen.j: 子に遣隋使・小野妹子らがいる。
sen.e: One of his sons was ONO no Imoko, a Japanese official diplomatic on delegations sent to China during the Sui dynasty.
One of his sons was ONO no Imoko, a Japanese envoy to Sui Dynasty China.
sen.cmt: 遣隋使、隋のところを書き直しました。
sen.e: One of his sons was ONO no Imoko, a Japanese envoy to Sui Dynasty China.
